name: NSRangeSpecifier
desc: A specifier for a range of objects in a container.

items.name: init(containerClassDescription: NSScriptClassDescription, containerSpecifier: NSScriptObjectSpecifier?, key: String, start: NSScriptObjectSpecifier?, end: NSScriptObjectSpecifier?)
items.desc: Returns a range specifier initialized with the given properties.

items.name: var endSpecifier: NSScriptObjectSpecifier?
items.desc: Sets the object specifier representing the last object of the range to a given object.

items.name: var startSpecifier: NSScriptObjectSpecifier?
items.desc: Returns the object specifier representing the first object of the range.
